relation: Innova Computing provides PostgreSQL administration and development services as well as system administration services. We focus on providing quality solutions that meet your business needs.
Innova Computing has over 15 years of experience in application development and over 9 years of database administration and system administration experience.

textAfterTable: Name AcuGIS (https://www.acugis.com/) Provides Provides both support and hosting. Description AcuGIS provides PostgreSQL hosting and PostgreSQL based GIS hosting services to individuals, businesses, and academic and research institutions in over 40 countries worldwide. AcuGIS offers full support for both PostgreSQL 8 and PostgreSQL 9. Our highly knowledgeable support staff is focused on PostgreSQL. Combined with our Enterprise grade hardware and exclusive PostgreSQL tools, you can be assured of reliable, high performance PostgreSQL hosting services. Number of employees 10 Office locations New York, London, Frankfurt Hours 24x7x365 Languages English Experience Providing PostgreSQL hosting and support services since 2005.
